topic.title: Night in company of a Sweet and very sexy Girl...
topic.body:
Win a Night in company of a Sweet and very sexy Girl...
or £5.000GBP
THE NIGHT ALSO INCLUDES
ONE NIGHT IN HIGHT CLASS HOTEL
A BOTTLE OF YOU PREFERRED LIQUOR!
WIN A NIGHT WITH A BEAUTIFUL SEXY GIRL...
TICKETS PRICE: £100.00
-- THE WINNER TICKET GO WITH THE LAST THREE NUMBERS OF
THE MAJOR PRIZE FROM The EuroMillions draw's
ON 20 DECEMBER 2019

topic.title: How to play DreamRaffle! * Choose 3 pairs of number as you wish.
topic.body:
Win a Night in company of a Sweet and very sexy Girl...
or £5.000GBP
THE NIGHT ALSO INCLUDES
* ONE NIGHT IN HIGHT CLASS HOTEL
* A BOTTLE OF YOU PREFERRED LIQUOR!
WIN A NIGHT WITH A BEAUTIFUL SEXY GIRL...
TICKETS PRICE: £100.00
-- THE WINNER TICKET GO WITH THE LAST THREE NUMBERS OF
THE MAJOR PRIZE FROM The EuroMillions draw's
ON 20 DECEMBER 2019

How to play DreamRaffle!
* Choose 3 pairs of number as you wish.
    (Eg. 340-578-674)
* Use the QR CODE on display to pay for your Tickets.
* Proof of sending. You should be able to send Us the transaction ID(TXID)
by e-mail.
